items.content_html: Air-rest-api is a cutting-edge, lightweight RESTful API framework written in TypeScript and designed to streamline the development and deployment of robust and efficient APIs. With an emphasis on simplicity, speed, and flexibility, this framework empowers developers to create high-performance REST APIs effortlessly.
items.title: Mullayam/air-rest-api: Air-rest-api is a cutting-edge, lightweight RESTful API framework written in TypeScript and designed to streamline the development and deployment of robust and efficient APIs. With an emphasis on simplicity, speed, and flexibility, this framework empowers developers to create high-performance REST APIs effortlessly.

items.content_html: `Text-Util` is a lightweight text utility web app designed for quick tasks. Count characters and words, switch text between uppercase and lowercase, and effortlessly extract email addresses from input text. Simplify your text processing needs with this user-friendly tool.
items.title: ArnavMakode/Text-Util: `Text-Util` is a lightweight text utility web app designed for quick tasks. Count characters and words, switch text between uppercase and lowercase, and effortlessly extract email addresses from input text. Simplify your text processing needs with this user-friendly tool.
